title: New: Francis Lung â€“ This Night Has Opened My Eyes (The Smiths Cover)
content:
Covering The Smiths is never easy, mainly due to the fact that almost every single one of their tracks are recorded to complete and utter perfection, with the unique atmospheric quality that the Mancunian outfit possessed.

Fellow Manchester based artist Francis Lung, of WU LYF fame, does his utmost best and pulls off a fantastically poignant acoustic rendition of This Night Has Opened My Eyes. Stripping away the Marr guitar line is a bold move, however adds an extra level of melancholy and indecision to the track. Check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
